page.title: 16Tourism in our area
page.content: We get many tourists in the area.Some stay at a caravan site in our block. Most of them are walkers,climbers, fishermen or outdoor pursuit enthus- iasts. Many steam enthusiasts come to Long Marton to take photographs of steam trains still running on the Carlisle to settle line. There are two Roman sites in the block, a camp and a fortlet.The old Roman road passes through and is still used as a footpath to Appleby. There is an old tithe barn near the church,the church itself has many in- teresting features and attracts many vsitors. Many people follow the river look- ing for wild life,flora and fauna and to see the weirs and bridges. Many visitors stay locally to be close to the Lake District.
